prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Piano, Organ, Bass, Guitar, Drums, but without Synth Lead.
captions:
Style 1:
This track features Piano, Organ, Bass, Guitar, and Drums, but no Synth Lead.

Style 2:
This composition is comprised of Piano, Organ, Bass, Guitar, and Drums, omitting Synth Lead.

Style 3:
This song is Piano, Organ, Bass, Guitar, and Drums, Synth Lead excluded.
